title: Man with White Cane Facing Right

adjectives: Used to represent accessibility, awareness, or independence for the visually impaired.
verbs: Depicts the act of walking or navigating using a white cane.
nouns: A man holding a white cane and facing toward the right, representing visual impairment or accessibility.

alsoKnownAs: Man Using White Cane Facing Right
description: A man shown walking and facing right while holding a white cane, representing someone who is blind or visually impaired. Symbolizes accessibility, independence, and inclusivity for people with vision loss.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the man with white cane facing right emoji depicts a man walking with a white cane, rendered with realistic proportions and subtle movement shading. The cane and figure are detailed with Apple‚Äôs signature gradients to convey depth and accessibility themes.
